mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visitors at Texas Gate, May 19, 1902
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Maxey, Mary Frances Campbell (Mrs. Thomas Sheldon Maxey), d. 1938
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of visitors posing in front of the Texas Gate entrance at Mount Vernon. Included in the group is Mrs. Maxey (center-dressed in black), Vice Regent for Texas for the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association. A handwritten note on the reverse reads, "Texas Gate, Mount Vernon, May 1902 - Mrs. Burleson (sp?), Mrs. Maxey, Mrs. Lee."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Texas Gate
